document_data.name: Vernadsky
document_data.mainbody: The '''Vernadsky''' family was a [[Raumviran]] noble family who inhabited the city of [[Almorel]] on the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Base of Operations: The Vernadskys occupied the [[Vernadsky Fief]]â€”a large walled compound that was located almost directly in the center of Almorel along the [[Golden Way]]. Much of the estate bordered the promenade that led to [[Mechnik]] [[Nikitsky]]'s residence.
